properties.comment: Model parameter definition ========================== Model : Pump Type : Example Parameters ---------- PressureSamples [Pa] Array of operation points for the pump MassFlowSamples [kg/s] Array of corresponding mass floes to the given pressure samples DensityFluid [kg/m3] desity of the pumped fluid ElectricalPower [W] Electrical power of the pump if running GasPressureInitial [Pa] (opt.) Initial pressure of the gas, if a reservoir is used GasVolumeInitial [m3] (opt.) Initial volume of the gas, if a reservoir is used FluidVolumeInitial [m3] (opt.) Initial volume of the fluid, if a reservoir is used PressureMax [Pa] (opt.) Pump turn off value, if a reservoir is used PressureMin [Pa] (opt.) Pump turn on value, if a reservoir is used
